snippet.title: Sly Cooper® : Thieves in Time Official Announce Trailer E3
snippet.description: Check out the announce trailer for the next chapter in the critically-acclaimed Sly Cooper® series. Sly and the gang are back with an epic brand new adventure exclusively for the PlayStation®3 system.
